data.text: Dii xɛmɛn minima nɛn Yese bɔnsɔnni11.1 Yese nan Dawuda fafe ra. Na sɛbɛxi Samuyɛli Singena 16.18-19 kui.
Alatalaa Nii Sariɲanxin luma nɛn a yi,
A niin sama nɛn Alatala yɛɛragaxun fari.
Koni a sɛnbɛtarene makitima nɛn tinxinni.
Tinxinyaan nun tɔgɔndiyaan luma nɛn a yi
Nayi, kankon nun yɛxɛɛ diin luma nɛn e bode xɔn,
Ɲinge gilɛn nun kanko gbeena e dɛgema nɛn,
Dii ɲɔrɛn sabaan soma nɛn saɲin soden dɛxɔn,
Fe ɲaxi mi fa luma na, gbalo mi na
A taxamasenna tima nɛn siyane xa,
Alatala igen ɲanma nɛn Misiran fɔxɔ ige yireni,
Kiraan luma nɛn a yamaan xa
